Game.Name: Pro Yakyuu World Stadium (Japan)
Game.plot: Overview:Pro Yakyuu World Stadium (""Professional Baseball World Stadium") is a baseball simulator from Namco and the first of the World Stadium off-shoot series of their Family Stadium, or Famista, franchise for the Nintendo Famicom/NES. The World Stadium games are those released on a non-Nintendo system.It was released in the Arcade and for the PC Engine in 1988 and was the first baseball game for the latter system, narrowly beating the release of Hudson's World Class Baseball (JP: Power League) by a month. Cheat: Hidden ScreenAt the title screen, hold I + II + Select and press Run.Cheat: Hidden ScreenAt the 2 Player mode team selection screen, on Controller 2, hold II + Select + Run and press Left. If done right, the cursor will disappear. You can press Left up to 6 times to choose between 6 different hidden teams.Cheat: Hidden ScreenAt the Watch mode team selection screen, highlight the N Team (Namco Team) and press I to choose it. Now, you can press Right up to 5 times to choose between 5 different hidden teams.Cheat: Namco Team Game PasswordsAt the 1 Player team selection screen, pick the N Team (Namco Team) and enter the following passwords:
Game.Notes: Pro Yakyuu World Stadium (""Professional Baseball World Stadium") is a baseball simulator from Namco and the first of the World Stadium off-shoot series of their Family Stadium, or Famista, franchise for the Nintendo Famicom/NES. The World Stadium games are those released on a non-Nintendo system. It was released in the Arcade and for the PC Engine in 1988 and was the first baseball game for the latter system, narrowly beating the release of Hudson's World Class Baseball (JP: Power League) by a month.
